name: officedev-microsoft-teams-samples-tab-personal-mvc-csharp
title: Personal tabs in ASP.NET Core with MVC
shortDescription: This sample app demonstrates how to create a custom personal tab for Microsoft Teams using ASP.NET Core MVC.
longDescription: This sample showcases the development of a custom personal tab for Microsoft Teams, utilizing ASP.NET Core MVC to enhance user interaction. It includes instructions for manifest configuration, local testing with tunneling solutions, and deployment within Teams and Office applications.

thumbnails.alt: Solution UX showing personal tabs in asp.net core with mvc
